attributes.action: (re expenses) - call a general election immediately, enabling the country to remove from office those MPs who have been wrongly claiming expenses from the public purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
17.5.09
I propose an immediate general election, in light of the recent scandal over MP's expenses.
Constituencies must be given the chance to remove parliamentary representatives who have claimed 'unnecessary' expenses.
Commons rules state that ACAs (additional cost allowance) expenses are those '...necessarily incurred by the Member in staying overnight away from the Member’s only or main residence, for the purpose of performing parliamentary duties'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
